context.rdfs:comment: An list item, e.g. a step in a checklist or how-to description.
context.rdfs:label: ListItem

properties.rdfs:comment: A link to the ListItem that follows the current one.
properties.rdfs:label: nextItem

properties.rdfs:comment: A link to the ListItem that preceeds the current one.
properties.rdfs:label: previousItem
